items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
items.body: Absolutely love this dress. It fits perfectly. The color is exactly what was presented and the quality is great. I love the details in the stretchy parts. It is worth giving it a try. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: I bought this dress in multiple colors! Wore it for Christmas. I ordered a small and it was true to size, very comfortable. I am now 15 weeks pregnant and have worn it to work and it still fits and stretchy. Read more
items.author: Taylor Varela

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dress
items.body: It’s a good little dress. The fabric is soft and has the right amount of stretch. It’s thick but not too heavy. My only complaint is that it isn’t as long as depicted. I ordered two, once in black and another in blue. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cozy dress, not ankle length...
items.body: I wear a size 14, ordered the largest size and found this warm and cozy dress very nice, I order two colors. Not too roomy, but not too "hugging". Goes well with tall dress boots, but does Not fall at your ankles without rising up a few inches as you walk. I am 5'3". This is why I like wearing with tall suede boots. The fabric stays in place. Wear a thigh length, or better yet capris length half or full length smoothing lingerie underneath for a nice smooth silhouette. Otherwise, panty lines, and any possible cellulite "dimple" on your beautiful body will be emphasized. If you wear with tall sleek leather boots instead of suede, with each step, you will hear a "hissing" sound as the dress comes into contact with your boot surface. This creates a nice static electricity charge unfortunately. Looks great with a big chunky belt to match boots if you choose to wear them. If you wear oxfords or pumps your ankles will show if your are 5'3" or taller. Read more
items.author: Reba

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Perfect maternity dress. It was very un-flattering when my stomach was smaller. However, once I was 37 weeks and very large, it was more flattering! Sleeves were a little big and long. Read more
items.author: KM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant maxi dress
items.body: Soft cotton like material. Stretches and is good quality. The color was perfect on my skin tone. I'm 5'4" and it went down to my ankles. It's a good length. I got a size M so it's a little bit lose fit. Size down if you want it tight. This is an elegant looking maxi dress. Read more
items.author: Murielle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Cozy
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is exactly what I hoped for! The knit fabric is soft, stretchy, and warm without feeling heavy. The slim fit is very flattering, and the maxi length makes it easy to dress up or keep casual. I wore it with heels for a dinner out and got so many compliments. Fits true to size and feels really comfortable—I’ll definitely be ordering another color! Read more
items.author: Peach State Chic

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars REALLY BAD QUALITY
items.body: Look its thick, its not see through, but oh mannnnn is it cheap. The shape is all wrong and the cut is all over the place. The underarms were really baggy and the neckline looked like someone cut it with scissors. If you are maybe on the curvy side this could be super cute, but Im 5'3 and 115ibs and it just drowned me. For the price and the right body this could be a score, but if youre on the smaller side the material and the cut just did not work. Read more
items.author: mia pernice

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Lightblue, Apricot, Chocolate, Rose, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Gray Blue, Lightpurple, Navy, Plum, Khaki, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
